articles.content:
Kim Yong Chun Meets Angolan Armed Forces Delegation
    Pyongyang, May 31 (KCNA) -- Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Kim Yong Chun, member of the DPRK National Defense Commission and chief of the General Staff of the KPA, met and had a friendly talk with the delegation of the Angolan armed forces headed by General Agostino Fernandes Nelumba, chief of the General Staff of the armed forces, which paid a courtesy call on him today.
 Present there were KPA Colonel General Pak Sung Won and other general officers and officers.    
 The delegation was greeted at the airport by Col. General Pak Sung Won and other general officers and officers.

DPRK Government Special Envoy Leaves to Attend NAM Summit
    Pyongyang, May 31 (KCNA) -- DPRK Vice-Foreign Minister Choe Su Hon left here today to participate in the 2nd NAM Summit to be held in Qatar as a special envoy of the DPRK government.
 Prior to the summit, a delegation of the DPRK Foreign Ministry headed by him will visit Egypt, Syria and so on.

articles.content:
Lao Party Delegation Leaves
    Pyongyang, May 31 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party headed by Somsavath Lengsavath, member and chairman of the Commission for External Affairs of its Central Committee and deputy prime minister and concurrently minister of Foreign Affairs of the Lao government, flew here today after winding up its four-day visit to the DPRK.
 They were seen off at the airport by Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kim Yong Il, officials concerned, Lao Ambassador Chanpheng Sihaphom and embassy officials.    
 During their stay, they visited Mangyongdae, the Pyongyang Metro and other places.
